import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import getCartAction from '../Store/Action/Get_Cart_Action' const Checkout = () => { const [quantity, setQuantity] = useState(1) const dispatch = useDispatch() let getCartdata = useSelector(state => state.GetCartReducer?.cartItem) || {} let requireddetail = getCartdata.map((item) => { return { ...item.productData[0] } }) console.log(requireddetail) useEffect(() => { getCartAction(dispatch, {}) }, []) let sellPrice = requireddetail ? requireddetail.map((item) => { parseFloat(item.Price?.sell_price?.$numberDecimal)}):"" let sum = requireddetail ? requireddetail.reduce((accumulator, curValue) => accumulator + parseFloat(curValue.Price?.sell_price?.$numberDecimal), 0) : null const increment = () => { setQuantity(quantity + 1) sum = sum+[(quantity-1)*sellPrice] } const decrement = () => { if (quantity === 1) { return } else { setQuantity(quantity - 1) } } return ( <>

order summary

{requireddetail ? requireddetail.map((curr, index) => { console.log(curr) return (
{curr.Title}{curr?.Price?.sell_price?.$numberDecimal}{curr?.Price?.current_store_price?.$numberDecimal}
) }) : null}
Total Amount{sum}
ShippingFree
Final Amount₹500.00

{curr?.Title} {curr.Title} {curr?.Price?.sell_price?.$numberDecimal} {curr?.Price?.current_store_price?.$numberDecimal}
) }) : null}
Total Amount ₹200.00
Shipping Free
Final Amount ₹200.00
*/} ) } export default Checkout
